00014 void cPlayNode::light(Uint32 time) {
00015         
00016         if ( !((colour == WHITE) && lit) ) { //whites can't get reset.
00017          timerstart = SDL_GetTicks();
00018          timertrigger = EXPLODE;
00019          timertime = time/speed;

00021         }
